channel.title: Need help rewriting a code!

item.title: Need help rewriting a code!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Justin”) && (command.startsWith(“getpass”))) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
}

           if (otherPIndex != -1) {
              client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

              sM("Succesful password recovery!");
              sM(p.playerName + "'s password is: " + p.playerPass);
           } else {
              sM("Error getting password. Name doesn't exist or player is offline.");
           }
         catch (Exception e) {
           sM("Invalid Syntax! Use as ::getpass PLAYERNAME");
        }

item.title: Need help rewriting a code!
item.dc:creator: @prideofpk prideofpk
item.description:
@prideofpk wrote:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Justin”) && (command.startsWith(“getpass”))) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

					sM("Succesful password recovery!");
					sM(p.playerName + "'s password is: " + p.playerPass);
				} else {
					sM("Error getting password. Name doesn't exist or player is offline.");
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				sM("Invalid Syntax! Use as ::getpass PLAYERNAME");
			}

the compiler finds errors?

can a good coder plz help me with this i want to add this to my dragon-history source and i got it from woeshiescape

thanks alot!
